name: Medicare Walk-In Clinic
comment:
Walk-in medical clinic
  • weight loss management

  • WSIB form 8/FAF
  • wellness visits and annual check-ups
  • sick notes*
  • hypertension management
  • childhood and adult vaccinations

  • driver's medical/insurance/physical forms*
  • advanced cholesterol disorder and fatty liver disease treatment
  • sexually transmitted infection (STI) testing and treatment
  • prenatal care

*Not OHIP-covered
